theory.explanation: Unlike `for`, the `while` loop checks a condition before every run. If the condition is still true, it repeats the block. You must update something inside the loop, or it could run forever!
keyPoints: Use `while condition:` to start a loop
The condition is checked every time
Be careful to avoid infinite loops
